name: Take Me There
description:
"Take Me There" was created for the Wits and Vega Intercampus Game Jam 2021. A stylistic first person puzzle game where the player must explore a typical haunted mansion. Strong in environmental story telling, and scariness [comment from Playtester], and metaphors. We hope to play off of player understanding of first person shooter mechanics. 

Controls

WASD - Movement

E - interact with environment

Left Click - Shoot Gun

Hint

Don't Look...

Created by Mega Parkour Studio

AshCubed (Ashveer Jugdav) (https://ashcubed.itch.io)

SaibaShadow (Connor Munro) (https://saibashadow.itch.io)
